PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-04612009-03-26,  ,  ,  ,  ,  PSEP
ActFirearms Act
PrecisOrder extending the exemption from the application of the Firearms Act and from certain possession offences under the Criminal Code that was granted on April 22, 2004, to UNITED STATES LAW ENFORCEMENT OFFICERS. This measure would facilitate the travel of American law enforcement officers who have to transit, to access or return from a work assignment in the United States and would replace the order presently in force wich expire on April 1, 2009 which extends the exemption for two years.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
